Zaki Fatin Abdel Wahab (Arabic; 18 Febụwarị 1961 - 20 Machị 2022) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri na onye nduzi ihe nkiri.
A mụrụ nwa nwoke nke onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-eme ihe nkiri Leila Mourad na onye nduzi ihe nkiri Fatin Abdel Wahab n'abalị 18 ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 1961
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Ngalaba Nchịkwa nke Cairo Higher Institute of Cinema n'afọ 1983

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye enyemaka onye nduzi nke abụọ na ihe nkiri People on the Top (1981) na dịka onye na-enyere onye nduzi aka n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Youssef Chahine, gụnyere The Sixth Day (1986), nke o mere nke mbụ ya dịka onye ihe nkiri. N'afọ 1996, Zaki duziri ihe nkiri ya "Romantica", nke bụ akụkọ ndụ ya.
Zaki lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Soad Hosny, mgbe ọ kewapụrụ ya na onye nduzi ihe nkiri Ali Badrakhan
Otú ọ dị, ha kewara mgbe ọnwa ole na ole nke alụmdi na nwunye gasịrị, Zaki kwuru n'ihe karịrị otu ajụjụ ọnụ na ihe kpatara ya bụ mmegide nne ya
Ọ nwụrụ na 20 Machị 2022 mgbe ọ lụchara ọgụ na ọrịa kansa akpa ume.
